label: 鎮西探題
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 3:  Medieval Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1990
説明文: Office of the military governor of Kyushu established in 1293 in the wake of the Mongol invasions and accorded powers similar to those of the Rokuhara tandai; also called Kyushu tandai.　[六波羅探題、九州探題]
